alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 06 at 11:50AM CST until January 12 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Kentucky... Illinois...Missouri... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo. .Heavy rain from last weekend has contributed to rises on the Ohio River drainage basin this week with minor flooding anticipated. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam, Cairo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 40.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly agricultural bottomland and low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 37.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to a crest of 41.0 feet Monday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
